info.name: Nebu API Collection - Nuevo

header.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://www.googletagmanager.com https://connect.facebook.net https://checkout.culqi.com https://static.cloudflareinsights.com https://embed.cloudflarestream.com https://www.tiktok.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; font-src 'self' data: https://fonts.gstatic.com; connect-src 'self' https://api.flow-telligence.com wss://api.flow-telligence.com https://www.google-analytics.com https://analytics.google.com https://www.facebook.com; frame-src https://checkout.culqi.com https://customer-zbno8sqqfzr3s0ue.cloudflarestream.com https://customer-6wol0f3dx3u8wuhd.cloudflarestream.com https://iframe.cloudflarestream.com https://www.facebook.com https://web.facebook.com https://www.tiktok.com; media-src 'self' https://customer-zbno8sqqfzr3s0ue.cloudflarestream.com https://customer-6wol0f3dx3u8wuhd.cloudflarestream.com blob:;

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Nebu Dino de Lucas",
  "model": "Nebu Dino v1",
  "manufacturer": "Nebu Technologies",
  "status": "active",
  "firmwareVersion": "2.0.1",
  "batteryLevel": "85%",
  "signalStrength": "-45dBm",
  "userId": "00151790-aac4-4031-95e1-f129c5f40b4f",
  "ownerId": "aaeb7132-78a4-43f2-9992-360ed91ddc53",
  "notes": "Juguete para Lucas, 7 a√±os. Intereses: dinosaurios, espacio, aventuras",
  "lastSeenAt": "2025-12-15T18:00:00Z",
  "activatedAt": "2025-12-15T10:30:00Z",
  "settings": {
    "volume": 75,
    "brightness": 85,
    "language": "es",
    "timezone": "America/Lima",
    "autoUpdate": true
  },
  "capabilities": {
    "voice": true,
    "movement": true,
    "lights": true,
    "sensors": ["temperature", "proximity"],
    "aiFeatures": ["speech_recognition", "face_detection"]
  }
}
